query: who is god to challenge me?

results.text: Where were you when I laid the earth's foundation? Tell me, if you understand.
results.reason: God questions Job to remind him of His supreme power and wisdom.
results.reflection: God's sovereignty and creation power surpass human understanding.

results.text: "For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways," declares the LORD. "As the heavens are higher than the earth, so are my ways higher than your ways and my thoughts than your thoughts."
results.reason: God's ways and thoughts are beyond human comprehension.
results.reflection: Trust in God's higher wisdom and divine plan.

results.text: Oh, the depth of the riches of the wisdom and knowledge of God! How unsearchable his judgments, and his paths beyond tracing out!
results.reason: Paul exclaims the incomprehensible nature of God's wisdom and judgments.
results.reflection: Marvel at the infinite wisdom of God, beyond our understanding.

results.text: Great is our Lord and mighty in power; his understanding has no limit.
results.reason: The psalmist highlights God's boundless understanding and power.
results.reflection: Acknowledge God's limitless understanding and strength.

results.text: There is no wisdom, no insight, no plan that can succeed against the LORD.
results.reason: This verse affirms that no human wisdom can prevail against God's plans.
results.reflection: Submit to the unfailing and supreme plans of the Lord.
